job_title: Client Services Manager in North York, ON
pros: As a mission-driven organization, Credit Canada provides the opportunity to contribute towards important and rewarding work – the betterment of financial future selves. It is not an easy task, but luckily the work environment is warm, management is supportive, and collaboration is highly encouraged.
cons: Time management is very important to handle workload expectations.

pros:
A great company to work for!

We are Canada's leader in credit counselling, transforming the way people use credit. This means that we operate with the utmost integrity and respect for our customers, employees, and other stakeholders.  

We are innovative in our approach to credit counselling and have a broad range of tools to help Canadians get out of debt, so they can get back into life.

As an employee, I have received the support that I need to allow me to excel in my role. Personal growth has been encouraged and supported and there has been opportunity for career advancement.
cons: Operating in a hybrid environment has it's benefits but one of the challenges has been to strike a good work-life balance.

review_title: A great company to work for!
job_title: Digital Strategist in North York, ON
pros: Credit Canada Debt Solutions is a wonderful place to work, learn and grow! The employees are very friendly and welcoming. Their mission of "getting people out of debt so they can get back to life" is brilliant and they empower their employees to work towards fulfilling that mission. Managers are always looking out for their team and making sure that everyone learns and grows. The communication is very open and you can go to anybody for advice or help.
cons: There are no cons. It's a great organization to work for!

review_title: A fun place to work with co-workers who are driven to help people get out of debt and back into life.
job_title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO) in Toronto, ON
pros:
Credit Canada seeks to continue to build a workforce the reflects the great diversity of its clients and the communities that we serve. By learning from each other’s differences, we gain strength through our people and our perspectives.

We are thought leaders and have built deep relationships with key stakeholders.

Our staff are driven by a shared purpose to create positive change for our clients, communities, and people.
cons: As a small organization we don't always have enough people resources to do accomplish everything that we would like to.

pros: It's a fast paced, innovative and positive work environment. The people are very friendly and supportive, it has a great family feel. Senior management encourages feedback and change, and they understand the need for work/life balance.
cons: We work with people in financial crisis, which can be stressful at times.
